nodes.text: The YT-1200 transport was a transport of the YT-series manufactured by Corellian Engineering Corporation, and was nearly identical to the YT-1210 transport.

The YT-1200 transport was manufactured by Corellian Engineering Corporation and was very similar to the YT-1210 transport, though the YT-1200 was distinguished from the other model by its two thrusters. The YT-1200 featured a side-mounted cockpit, a long sensor-laden boom that came out over the forehull, and ten attachment points that for adding optional upgrades and extensions.

After Corellian Engineering Corporation released the YT-1200 and YT-1210 transport models to the public, customers preferred the YT-1300 light freighter which left the company with a huge backlog of YT-1200 and YT-1210 models. In an attempt to generate more revenue, CEC upgraded the unsold inventory with more powerful engines, heavier weapons, a basic set of defensive shields and marketed the upgraded ships as the YT-1250 transport.
